explains: adj. （衣服）宽松的；浩繁的，长篇的，冗长的；（容器、家具等）容量大的；（作家）多产的

sentences.en: The FBI kept a voluminous file on Pablo Picasso.
sentences.cn: 联邦调查局保存了有关巴勃罗·毕加索的大量档案。

sentences.en: I sank down into a voluminous armchair.
sentences.cn: 我一下子坐在了宽大的扶手椅里。

sentences.en: So voluminous is this collection, which ranges from paintings and scrolls to ancient porcelain and statues.
sentences.cn: 这批藏品浩如烟海，从绘画和卷轴到古代瓷器和雕像都有。
